Information.camera_serial_number: leave blank if you have one cam, enter cam sn if you have multiple
Information.do_camera_inference: enable if you want to see ffy inference
Information.camera_mode: enable to collect data from camera
Information.path_to_output_data_root_folder: location of the root of the output data. ex. c:/temp/ -> c:/temp/class1/
Information.max_display_window_height: and height this is only for displaying the image on screen
Information.file_extension: extension to save the file to
Information.input_image_directory: location of the images to read and 'sort'; to be implemented
Information.labels: the key and class you wish to bind each key to
Information.camera_inference_labels: the index of each label from camera or label file
